name: Zen Mode
description: Under extreme stress, this Pokemon will unlock its hidden psychic abilities through the power of meditation, it will go back to normal the next day.
effect: Only Darmanitan may use this Ability. When at half or less of its HP, change to Zen Mode Form at the end of the Round. Use its Zen Mode Form from then on. Adjust its Attributes according to the Rank and Limits it has for each Form. This Ability cannot be swapped, copied, replaced or nullified (ignoring the effects of Skill Swap, Worry Seed, Gastro Acid, Trace etc.)
